attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.desc: Controls should Drawer be inserted to DocumentBody Element, nested Drawer must assign this param to **true**

attributes.name: before-close
attributes.desc: If set, closing procedure will be halted
attributes.type: function(done), done is function type that accepts a boolean as parameter, calling done with true or without parameter will abort the close procedure

attributes.name: close-on-press-escape
attributes.desc: Indicates whether Drawer can be closed by pressing ESC

attributes.name: destroy-on-close
attributes.desc: Indicates whether children should be destroyed after Drawer closed

attributes.name: modal-append-to-body
attributes.desc: Indicates should shadowing layer be insert into DocumentBody element

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.desc: Should show close button at the top right of Drawer

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: Drawer's size, if Drawer is horizontal mode, it effects the width property, otherwise it effects the height property, when size is `number` type, it describes the size by unit of pixels; when size is `string` type, it should be used with `x%` notation, other wise it will be interpreted to pixel unit

attributes.name: title
attributes.desc: Drawer's title, can also be set by named slot, detailed descriptions can be found in the slot form

attributes.name: visible
attributes.desc: Should Drawer be displayed, also support the `.sync` notation

attributes.name: wrapperClosable
attributes.desc: Indicates whether user can close Drawer by clicking the shadowing layer.

attributes.name: withHeader
attributes.desc: Flag that controls the header section's existance, default to true, when withHeader set to false, both `title attribute` and `title slot` won't work

events.name: @open
events.desc: Triggered before Drawer opening animation begins

events.name: @opened
events.desc: Triggered after Drawer opening animation ended

events.name: @close
events.desc: Triggered before Drawer closing animation begins

events.name: @closed
events.desc: Triggered after Drawer closing animation ended

methods.name: closeDrawer
methods.desc: In order to close Drawer, this method will call `before-close`.
